Title: Play Sound in Silverlight using MediaElement
Description: This project explains how to play sound in Microsoft Silverlight using MediaElement.
HomeWiki:
This project demonstrates how to play an audio file on Microsoft Silverlight.

To see the step by step tutorial go to: http://silverlighttips.com/?tag=/mediaelement.

For Q&A and support on this project go to Silverlight Forums here: http://silverlightforums.com/showthread.php?p=2080#post2080.
